title: X-ACTO Pencil Sharpener, SchoolPro Electric Sharpener, Heavy Duty for School, Classroom and Teacher, Perfect Addition to Homeschooling Supplies, Black
description: The more pencil leads break, the more distractions in the classroom. That’s why the break-resistant X-ACTO School Pro was made to get woodcase pencils to a precise point for less lead breakage. That’s because its flyaway cutter feature stops sharpening when pencils reach their ideal sharpness. Meanwhile, a six-size dial fits nearly every pencil. The School Pro even works great on colored pencils! It’s no wonder X-ACTO is the #1 electric pencil sharpener brand!+
